item.description: Avalaible online at effective-altruism.com (pdf) Notes I. What is Effective Altruism? Effective altruism is a growing community based around the idea of aiming to do the most good that one can. It involves: Being open to all the possible ways to do good and pursuing the path with the biggest positive impact; Using evidence to figure out how to do the most good; and Choosing to make altruism a significant part of oneâ€™s life.
